overview: Hard Men, Inc. is a full-service company offering a wide range of servicing options. C.E.O. Sara Hardman makes sure that her able-bodied employees guarantee satisfaction for each and every customer. Sara's friends and customers are thrilled with the results and no one is complaining. No one except for Sara's friend Jessica. She is concerned about the truth behind Sara's business and, more importantly, if Sara is busy servicing her friends...who is servicing Sara?
title: Servicing Sara
